title: Textile, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk and gilded paper
Technique: compound satin with supplementary weft patterning
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Panel of cream-colored satin brocaded with colored silks and gilt paper in a design of fans, floral sprays, butterflies and streamers. Fans have landscape details with flowering branches of cherry blossom and a variety of birds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, early 20th century.
early 20th century. Medium: silk and gilded paper
Technique: compound satin with supplementary weft patterning. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-28.
